verses.verse: (A Maskil of Asaph.) O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> hast Thou <S%H2186>rejected<s%> [us] <S%H5331>forever<s%>? Why does Thine <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H6225>smoke<s%> against the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of Thy <S%H4830>pasture<s%>?

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> Thy <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> which Thou hast <S%H7069>purchased<s%> of <S%H6924>old,<s%> Which Thou hast <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> to be the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of Thine <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> [And] <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H2088>where<s%> Thou hast <S%H7931>dwelt.<s%>

<S%H7311>Turn<s%> Thy <S%H6471>footsteps<s%> toward the <S%H5331>perpetual<s%> <S%H4876>ruins;<s%> The <S%H340>enemy<s%> has <S%H7489>damaged<s%> <S%H3605>everything<s%> within the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>

Thine <S%H6887>adversaries<s%> have <S%H7580>roared<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of Thy <S%H4150>meeting<s%> <S%H4150>place;<s%> They have <S%H7760>set<s%> up their own <S%H226>standards<s%> for <S%H226>signs.<s%>
It <S%H3045>seems<s%> as if one had <S%H935>lifted<s%> up [His] <S%H7134>axe<s%> in a <S%H5441>forest<s%> of <S%H6086>trees.<s%>
And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3162>all<s%> its <S%H6603>carved<s%> <S%H6603>work<s%> They <S%H1986>smash<s%> with <S%H3781>hatchet<s%> and <S%H3597>hammers.<s%>
They have <S%H7971>burned<s%> <S%H784><s%> Thy <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> to the <S%H776>ground;<s%> They have <S%H2490>defiled<s%> the <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H4908>place<s%> of Thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> "Let us <S%H3162>completely<s%> <S%H3238>subdue<s%> them." They have <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4150>meeting<s%> <S%H4150>places<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

We do not <S%H7200>see<s%> our <S%H226>signs;<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> any <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> is there any <S%H854>among<s%> us who <S%H3045>knows<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H5704>long.<s%>

<S%H4970>How<s%> <S%H5704>long,<s%> <S%H4970><s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> will the <S%H6862>adversary<s%> <S%H2778>revile,<s%> [And] the <S%H340>enemy<s%> <S%H5006>spurn<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5331>forever<s%>?
<S%H4100>Why<s%> dost Thou <S%H7725>withdraw<s%> Thy <S%H3027>hand,<s%> even Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%>? From <S%H7130>within<s%> Thy <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> <S%H3615>destroy<s%> [them]!
Yet <S%H430>God<s%> is my <S%H4428>king<s%> from of <S%H6924>old,<s%> Who <S%H6466>works<s%> <S%H3444>deeds<s%> of <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Thou didst <S%H9461>divide<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> by Thy <S%H5797>strength;<s%> Thou didst <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H8577>sea<s%> <S%H8577>monsters<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
Thou didst <S%H7533>crush<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H3882>Leviathan;<s%> Thou didst <S%H5414>give<s%> him as <S%H3978>food<s%> for the <S%H5971>creatures<s%> of the <S%H9478>wilderness.<s%>
Thou didst <S%H1234>break<s%> <S%H1234>open<s%> <S%H4599>springs<s%> and <S%H5158>torrents;<s%> Thou didst <S%H3001>dry<s%> up ever-flowing <S%H5104>streams.<s%>
Thine is the <S%H3117>day,<s%> Thine <S%H637>also<s%> is the <S%H3915>night;<s%> Thou hast <S%H3559>prepared<s%> the <S%H3974>light<s%> and the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H5324>established<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1367>boundaries<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> Thou hast <S%H3335>made<s%> <S%H7019>summer<s%> and <S%H2779>winter.<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H384>this,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> that the <S%H340>enemy<s%> has <S%H2778>reviled;<s%> And a <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> has <S%H5006>spurned<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Do not <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of Thy <S%H8449>turtledove<s%> to the <S%H9130>wild<s%> <S%H9130>beast;<s%> Do not <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H9130>life<s%> of Thine <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> <S%H5331>forever.<s%>
<S%H5027>Consider<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant;<s%> For the <S%H4285>dark<s%> <S%H4285>places<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of the <S%H4999>habitations<s%> of <S%H2555>violence.<s%>
Let not the <S%H1790>oppressed<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H3637>dishonored;<s%> Let the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Do <S%H6965>arise,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> [and] <S%H7378>plead<s%> Thine own <S%H7379>cause;<s%> <S%H2142>Remember<s%> how the <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H5036>man<s%> <S%H2781>reproaches<s%> Thee <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long.

Do not <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of Thine <S%H6887>adversaries,<s%> The <S%H7588>uproar<s%> of those who <S%H6965>rise<s%> against Thee which <S%H5927>ascends<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>
